HISPANIC.question: Are you Spanish, Hispanic, or Latino/Latina? IF YES: Which group are you from?

values.an unincorporated area of a medium centr: an unincorporated area of a medium central city
values.a suburb of a medium size central city: a suburb of a medium size central city
values.a suburb of a large central city: a suburb of a large central city
values.an unincorporated area of a large centra: an unincorporated area of a large central city (division, township, etc.)
values.a medium size central city (50,000 to 25: a medium size central city (50,000 to 250,000)
values.not within an smsa, (within a county) an: not within an smsa, (within a county) and a small city (10,000 to 49,999)
values.an incorporated area less than 2,500 or: an incorporated area less than 2,500 or an unincorporated area of 1,000 to 2,499
values.open country within larger civil divisio: open country within larger civil divisions (division, township, etc.)

MARITAL.description: Are you currently married, widowed, divorced, separated, or have you never been married?
MARITAL.question: Are you currently married, widowed, divorced, separated, or have you never been married?

RELIG.question: What is your religious preference? Is it Protestant, Catholic, Jewish, some other religion, or no religion?

values.on-call, work only when called to work: on-call, work only when called to work

WEEKSWRK.question: In the last year how many weeks did you work either full-time or part-time not counting work around the house. include paid vacations and sick leave?

WRKSTAT.question: Last week were you working full time, part time, going to sаhool, keeping house, or what?

WRKHOME.question: How ofthen do you work from home?

SATFIN.description: We are interested in how people are getting along financially these days. So far as you and your family are concerned, would you say that you are pretty well satisfied with your present financial situation, more or less satisfied, or not satisfied at all?

AFFRMACT.description: Some people say that because of past discrimination, Blacks should be given preference in hiring and promotion. Others say that such preference in hiring and promotion of Blacks is wrong because it discriminates against Whites. What about your opinion?

LIFE.description: In general, do you find life exciting, pretty routine, or dull?
LIFE.question: In general, do you find life exciting, pretty routine, or dull?
